draw.overall_supervision_plan: I assess overall initial risk to be medium based upon catastrophic severity and unlikely probability, as well as critical severity of seldom possibility. I assess overall residual risk to be low based on critical severity of unlikely probability.Most Likely Risk: Cold Weather Injury Mitigation: Cadre will monitor weather and adjust uniform accordingly, Soldiers will pack and bring appropriate cold weather gear. The OIC/RSO is responsible for weather calls and uniform. Most Dangerous Risk: FratricideMitigation: An RSO to Shooter ratio will be 1:1 on each lane, all weapons will be inspected prior to coming off the range, Shooters will be familiarized and oriented to the range with left and right limits prior to WET status.
